nodes.text: A picture of a female Jedi Master meditating was present on one of the walls of the planet Corellia's Jedi enclave. In 41 ABY, when New Jedi Order Grand Master Luke Skywalker visited the Jedi Enclave, he saw the picture.
The picture of a meditating female Jedi Master first appeared in Aaron Allston's novel Legacy of the Force: Betrayal, the first entry in the Star Wars: Legacy of the Force series.
